  return JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(obj));
}

function deepCopy(obj) {
  let newObj = Array.isArray() ? [] : {};
  for (let item in obj) {
    if (obj.hasOwnPropertype(item)) {
      newObj[item] =
        typeof obj[item] === "object" ? deepCopy(obj[item]) : obj[item];
    }
  }
  return newObj;
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Person(name) {
  this.name = name;
}
Person.prototype.age = 23;
const person = new Person("Sunshine_lin");
for (const key in person) {
  console.log(key);
} // name age
// \u4F7F\u7528 hasOwnProperty
for (const key in person) {
  person.hasOwnProperty(key) && console.log(key);
} // name

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u4F7F\u7528 Map \u53BB\u91CD
function quchong1(arr) {
  const newArr = [];
  arr.reduce((pre, next) => {
    if (!pre.get(next)) {
      pre.set(next, 1);
      newArr.push(next);
    }
    return pre;
  }, new Map());
  return newArr;
}

// \u4F7F\u7528 Set \u53BB\u91CD
function quchong(arr) {
  return [...new Set(arr)];
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`// \u5B9A\u4E49\u4E00\u4E2A\u52A8\u7269\u7C7B
function Animal(name) {
  // \u5C5E\u6027
  this.name = name || "Animal";
  // \u5B9E\u4F8B\u65B9\u6CD5
  this.sleep = function () {
    console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01");
  };
}
// \u539F\u578B\u65B9\u6CD5
Animal.prototype.eat = function (food) {
  console.log(this.name + "\u6B63\u5728\u5403\uFF1A" + food);
};

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat() {}

Cat.prototype.name = "cat";

console.log(cat.name); // cat
cat.eat("fish"); // cat\u6B63\u5728\u5403\uFF1Afish
cat.sleep(); // cat\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); //true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // false
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  var instance = new Animal();
  instance.name = name || "Tom";
  return instance;
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // false

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  var animal = new Animal();
  for (var p in animal) {
    Cat.prototype[p] = animal[p];
  }
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // false
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}
Cat.prototype = new Animal();

Cat.prototype.constructor = Cat;

var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Cat(name) {
  Animal.call(this);
  this.name = name || "Tom";
}
// \u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u6CA1\u6709\u5B9E\u4F8B\u65B9\u6CD5\u7684\u7C7B
var Super = function () {};
Super.prototype = Animal.prototype;
//\u5C06\u5B9E\u4F8B\u4F5C\u4E3A\u5B50\u7C7B\u7684\u539F\u578B
Cat.prototype = new Super();

// Test Code
var cat = new Cat();
console.log(cat.name); // Tom
cat.sleep(); // Tom\u6B63\u5728\u7761\u89C9\uFF01
console.log(cat instanceof Animal); // true
console.log(cat instanceof Cat); //true

  name: "\u6797\u4E09\u5FC3",
  sayName: function () {
    console.log(this.name);
  },
};
const obj2 = {
  name: "Sunshin_Lin",
};
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
obj1.sayName.call(obj2); // Sunshin_Lin
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
obj1.sayName.apply(obj2); // Sunshin_Lin
// \u6539\u53D8sayName\u7684this\u6307\u5411obj2
const fn = obj1.sayName.bind(obj2);
fn(); // Sunshin_Lin
